## Overview

This is a collection of tutorials and scripts for working in Praat. 

## Scripts

```{r echo = F, results = 'asis', cache=FALSE}
scripts <- dir('./site_libs/assets/scripts', full = TRUE)
links   <- paste0("- ", "[", 
                  basename(strtrim(scripts, nchar(scripts)-6)), "]", 
                  "(", scripts, ")")
writeLines(links)
```

</br>

## Slides

```{r echo = F, results = 'asis'}
slides <- dir('slides', full = TRUE)
links  <- paste0("- ", "[", 
                 basename(slides), "]", "(", slides, "/index.html)")

total  <- length(links)
keep   <- total - 3

writeLines(links[1:keep])
```

</br>
